snippet: Trading five high-value Taliban prisoners for the release of the American could affect antiterrorism policy.
abstract: Editorial argues that Pres Obama's decision to trade five high-value Taliban prisoners for American Sgt Bowe Bergdahl raises serious questions and could affect nation's antiterrorism policy; notes Obama did not notify Congress, as required by law, and that it remains unclear whether men represent a further security threat.
lead_paragraph: Trading five high-value Taliban prisoners for the release of the American could affect antiterrorism policy.

headline.main: Freedom for Sgt. Bergdahl, at a Price
headline.print_headline: Freedom for Sgt. Bergdahl, at a Price

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
